::Firearm::

Firearm swears, not even bothering to dodge as optic shots nearly hit him. He 
growls, speeding up as he hears her scream into her comm. Prebon was going to 
pay for this...

Transforming into tank mode, Firearm slams down to the ground, his back 
thrusters speeding him at Spears, rapidly gaining on her as his missile 
launcher fires a missile, aiming at an area ten feet in front of her.
